abstract: Witnesses say demonstrators in Gaza, protesting unemployment, poverty and dire living conditions, were beaten with sticks and herded into jeeps by Hamas security officials.
lead_paragraph: Men believed to be Hamas security officials interrupted the demonstration, beat men and women with sticks and herded people into jeeps, said one protester.

headline.main: Gaza Protesters Beaten and Detained by Hamas Security Officials, Witnesses Say
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Gaza: A Political Protest Is Broken Up

snippet: Men believed to be Hamas security officials interrupted the demonstration, beat men and women with sticks and herded people into jeeps, said one protester.
